sys_script_include.name: AvailableBooksService

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_7b34dc2693260610ef267c5efaba105a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383151_bkquest.AvailableBooksService</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>AvailableBooksService</name><script><![CDATA[var AvailableBooksService = Class.create();
AvailableBooksService.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getAvailableBooksService: function() {
        var availableBooks = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_book_copy'); // Replace with your table name
        gr.addQuery('status', 'available');
        gr.query();

        while (gr.next()) {
            var bookSysId = gr.getValue('book_id');
            var bookGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_book'); // Replace with your table name
            if (bookGR.get(bookSysId)) {
                var authorSysId = bookGR.getValue('author');
                var authorName = this.getAuthorName(authorSysId);
                var coverImageUrl = this.getCoverImageUrl(bookGR.getValue('cover_image'));

                availableBooks.push({
                    title: bookGR.getValue('title'),
                    author: authorName,
                    cover_image: coverImageUrl
                });
            }
        }

        return availableBooks;
    },

    getAuthorName: function(authorSysId) {
        var authorGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_author'); // Replace with your table name
        if (authorGR.get(authorSysId)) {
            return authorGR.getDisplayValue();
        }
        return '';
    },

    getCoverImageUrl: function(coverImageSysId) {
        if (coverImageSysId) {
            return '/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=' + coverImageSysId;
        }
        return '';
    },

    type: 'AvailableBooksService'
});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-05 06:58:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b34dc2693260610ef267c5efaba105a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AvailableBooksService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7b34dc2693260610ef267c5efaba105a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-05 07:04:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
